replies.body_tagged: you forced me to, opinions on me?

replies.body: I first met you in a scrim I suppose and I never thought you were very good. I just thought you were in a tier 2 (at that point) Avicus Team full of regulars. However, I loved playing with you even if I didn't think you were all that good and then I was playing public OCN and you were on too; then you Raz and me went in Skype? and we played for a bit. I was on my laptop so you were fucking me haha. However, the next night we were LFM and Robin Barney and I had a serious talk about members. I mentioned you and said that you had improved as I generally thought that. They then trialied you I believe, I'm not sure as I was in Spain and then you got in. I think you take my jokes too seriously but other than that, you're quite good and you're chill.
replies.body_tagged: I first met you in a scrim I suppose and I never thought you were very good. I just thought you were in a tier 2 (at that point) Avicus Team full of regulars. However, I loved playing with you even if I didn't think you were all that good and then I was playing public OCN and you were on too; then you Raz and me went in Skype? and we played for a bit. I was on my laptop so you were fucking me haha. However, the next night we were LFM and Robin Barney and I had a serious talk about members. I mentioned you and said that you had improved as I generally thought that. They then trialied you I believe, I'm not sure as I was in Spain and then you got in. I think you take my jokes too seriously but other than that, you're quite good and you're chill.

replies.body:
Seeing as your question is stupid and I answered it toady, I'm going to give my honest opinion on you.

You're a really good player and a good team leader. You have your downsides and I love messing with you. You're a bit of a dick when it comes to me being another team leader however. You always think you're right and you never go through with someone elses idea. But anyway, I love you

replies.body:
Avicus I would probably join PPB because I believe they are the best /second best with BC, close behind Apollo and then Berzerk.

OCN is a lot harder. A lot of my friends used to be in Impact, however I have a few friends in current LG, Sandals and I even have friends in VH.I honestly have no idea, it would probably be one of those latter 3.

I'm going to answer this is more detail as I didn't really give a valid answer.

No, I do not hate you. I've seen you a few times on OCN and you were nice. You make good decisions and you act really innocent which Iike LMFAO. You seem to know alot and I'm sure you could get on a pretty good team if you retired from official.
